channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: River Shuttle Brambles, 25th August
item.description:
Hi, I live at number 124 Berwick Crescent. My garden fence is suffering damage due to brambles and over sized bushes breaking through them. I have cut them back to the boundary but have replaced a number of panels this spring/summer. Is there a cut due or can someone come and make a cut Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 124, Berwick Crescent, Falconwood, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grafitti tags, 25th August
item.description:
Grafitti on the bridge on Avery Hill Road near the traffic lights at the junction of Avery Hill Road and Footscray Road and also grafitti tag on the utility box on the corner of this junction. As reported elsewhere there is other grafitti in the area including Eastnor Road. Please can this blight on the area be removed ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Avery Hill Road, New Eltham, London
